wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Congratulations, Harry! I know that you've been itched to "do" it not just "talk" it, or in the case of MAAB perhaps, "herd" it. Speaking of MAAB, thanks for your tenure at the MS helm. Hopefully you'll still be involved in MAAB, but more like David, Maarten et al are involved. Enjoy the time off...
